biotools.summary: Kibio is an architecture and R package for next-generation data querying and sharing in big biology. It is used for easy scientific data handling, searching and sharing with Elasticsearch. kibior is built for data science and data manipulation, so when any data-related action or need is involved, notably sharing data. It mainly targets bioinformaticians, and more broadly, data scientists.
